assessmentQuestionVersion.name: HRCPR_WaiverText
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: I declare that, for the child(ren) listed for this section and on any additional sheets, I have not and will not make any claims for the Child rearing Provision for the period(s) accredited to my current/former spouse or common-law partner. Once I give up my rights to the Child Rearing Provision, the action cannot be reversed.
